trans-unit.source: Implements a markup extension that enables <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"></xref> creation.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"></xref> does not have an embedded profile, the profile instead being based on source and destination values.
This class is a markup extension implementation.

Markup extension classes exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and the members exposed by a markup extension are not typically called from user code.
This extension supports the [ColorConvertedBitmap Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) usage from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [ColorConvertedBitmap Markup Extension](../Topic/ColorConvertedBitmap%20Markup%20Extension.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.ColorConvertedBitmapExtension"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.ColorConvertedBitmapExtension"></xref> class.
A string that is parsed to determine three [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]: image source, source color context, and destination color context.
Returns an object that should be set on the property where this extension is applied.
An object that can provide services for the markup extension.
This service is expected to provide results for <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap"></xref> based on the values passed to the constructor.
